akn:section.akn:heading: Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 152306. Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges The corporation has the exclusive right to use the name “National Music Council” and seals, emblems, and badges the corporation adopts. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1413.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
15230636:676.Aug. 1, 1956, ch. 824, § 16, 70 Stat. 797.
The words “sole” and “as representing such Corporation” are omitted as unnecessary.
